meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_semantic_domain_model_sparql_query

languageKey.label: A speaking name for the query. It will be displayed in list views and single views.
The query body usually starts with "SELECT ?foo WHERE ...".
Limits the elements in the Query Result.
Defines an Offset.
The endpoint the query request should be sent to.
Additional namespaces.
